id, cloth_id clothId, my_company_code myCompanyCode, my_company_color myCompanyColor, num, order_ids orderIds, mark
mapper.select:
select
from order_input_summary ois,cloth_info ci
ois.cloth_id=ci.id and ois.order_ids is not null and ois.order_ids <>''
order by id desc
select distinct my_company_code myCompanyCode from order_input_summary where cloth_id = #{clothId} order by myCompanyCode
select distinct my_company_color myCompanyColor from order_input_summary where my_company_code = #{myCompanyCode} order by myCompanyColor

select oi.id, (select cloth_name from cloth_info where id=oi.cloth_id) clothName, oi.my_company_code myCompanyCode, #{t.id} summId, my_company_color myCompanyColor, num,unit,mark, (select name from salesman_info where id=salesman_id) saleManName, create_time createTime from order_input oi where INSTR((select concat(',',t.order_ids,',') from order_input_summary t where t.id=#{t.id}),concat(',',oi.id,','))>0
mapper.insert: insert into order_input_summary ( cloth_id, my_company_code, my_company_color, num, order_ids, mark,unit ) values( #{clothId}, #{myCompanyCode}, #{myCompanyColor}, #{num}, #{orderIds}, #{mark}, #{unit} )
mapper.select:
select
from order_input_summary where order_ids like '%${_parameter}%'

select oi.my_company_code myCompanyCode, oi.cloth_id clothId, oi.my_company_color myCompanyColor, (select cloth_name from cloth_info where id=oi.cloth_id) clothName from order_input_summary oi where id=#{id}
mapper.update:
update order_input_summary
order_ids=#{orderIds},
cloth_id=#{clothId},
my_company_code=#{myCompanyCode},
my_company_color=#{myCompanyColor},
num=#{num},
unit=#{unit},
